mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Notice ORDER BY notice_no DESC
mapper.insert: Insert into MBMS.NOTICE (notice_no, notice_subject, notice_content, writer_emp_no, notice_date) values (Notice_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{notice_subject}, #{notice_content} , #{writer_emp_no} , SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE Notice SET notice_no=#{notice_no}, notice_subject=#{notice_subject}, notice_content=#{notice_content}, writer_emp_no=#{writer_emp_no}, notice_date=#{notice_date} WHERE notice_no = #{notice_no}
